title: Patch Notes
content: bug where quickly skipping through the dialogue that begins when you interact with the Flumph Mating Rituals book would sometimes cause a blank edition of the Baldur's Mouth Gazette to open. When using the Camp Supply/Insert/Combine UIs, the selector no longer falls outside the selection bounds. Fixed the deity options not showing up when multiclassing Minthara into a cleric. Fixed a bug that would sometimes cause the Party Line to disappear when you open the Transcribe Scroll to Spellbook UI. A
